> 
> Is there a way to embed links within text so that "this" word could be a link? If so, teach me! Thanks.

No offence, but have you ever bothered to look what the little icons above the text field are for?

The easy way is to type the word you want linked, highlight it, then click the little icon of a globe with two links of chain on it. That will pop up a window to enter the link, which will be automatically applied to the highlighted text.
